titles.title: Break Forth Into Joy, Oh My Soul

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Break forth into joy, oh my soul,
So God's Spirit rises in me to light the way.
Break forth into joy, oh my soul.
Chorus:
Break forth into joy, break forth into joy, oh my soul.
Break forth into joy, into joy, into joy, oh my soul!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As Your purging fire consumes me I have strength to stand
Break forth into joy, oh my soul.
I will be that Man with Jesus who redeems the land
Break forth into joy, oh my soul.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When my spirit, soul, and body are in one accord,
Break forth into joy, oh my soul.
I will rule and reign with Jesus in Your kingdom, Lord.
Break forth into joy, oh my soul.
